info.game_comments:
Pranjal Vachaspati game 5.
Show dedicated "In memory of our friend and colleague Phil Wayne".

double_jeopardy_round: ADD "S" TO THE START OF THE WORD

(2, 1).clue: "It takes" this, a group of houses in a rural area, smaller than a town

(3, 1).clue: This "off a duck's back" denotes something that has little to no effect
